title: Qatar Will Allow Israelis to Fly Directly to Doha for World Cup
description: The move fell short of creating formal diplomatic ties between the countries, but it was the latest sign of warming relations between Israel and some Arab governments.
dc:creator: Patrick Kingsley and Vivian Nereim

media:description: The FIFA World Cup will begin in Qatar on Nov. 20.
